content:
I am working on implementing the C4BB EOB profiles for Professional, Inpatient, Outpatient, and Pharm. I am trying to locate a schema which represents what the FHIR server is going to look for as a format. For baseline resources, this is found by looking at the XML tab where the resource is defined. Structure | UML | XML | JSON ... etc. Where can I find the schema for these profiles? I checked the "XML" at the top of the page, but it seems to be a definition of the entire profile, not a schema to map to. Thanks!

ANSWERED - Thank you
The XML schema is the one of the base resources, there are no profile-specific schemas

Michele Mottini said:

The XML schema is the one of the base resources, there are no profile-specific schemas

Okay, I was not sure if there were things added in a profile that would not "fit" into the base schema so to speak.

Thank you
